content:
[explain]
攻击时，以1%%的机率恢复自身234点HP。 攻击时，以5%%的机率使自身恢复678点MP。

[if]
    [cooltime]
        15000
    [attack success]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [probability]
        1
    [restore]
        `hp`
        `+`    234    0
[/then]

[if]
    [cooltime]
        15000
    [attack success]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [probability]
        5
    [restore]
        `mp`
        `+`    678    0
[/then]
